snippet.title: Man trapped in Majura Parkway crash
snippet.content: Firefighters are working to free a man trapped in a truck after the vehicle crashed with a grader on the Majura Parkway. The Emergency Services Agency said the man was being treated by intensive-care paramedics for suspected lower limb injuries and would be transported to the Canberra Hospital once freed from the wreckage. The ACT Ambulance Service and ACT Fire & Rescue were alerted to the incident at 11.12 am and arrived to find the man trapped in the passenger side of the light truck. The crash occurred in the northbound lanes of the Majura Parkway near the Tambreet Street exit.
